title: 10,000x Return—When My Disciple Reaches Foundation Establishment, I Instantly Ascend to Immortality
original_title: 万倍返还——弟子筑基，我即刻飞升
author: Unknown
synopsis: Zhong Qing transmigrated into a cultivation world and spent five years as a talentless waste on Mufu Peak, the most desolate of Xianjiang Sect's seven peaks. His only inheritance from his late master, Daoist Nai, was the Peak Master title and a daily check-in system that rewarded everything except cultivation—Saint-grade methods he burned for warmth, divine weapons he used as kitchen tools. Then the system finally activates a new feature: the Trash Bond. By taking disciples who are complete wastes like himself, his disciples gain 100x cultivation speed while he receives 1,000x returns. When his first disciple cultivates for a day, Zhong Qing gains the equivalent of nearly 300 years of cultivation. The sect that looked down on him, the Peak Masters who mocked him, and the geniuses who dismissed him are about to discover that Mufu Peak's 'trash' has been hiding a mountain of treasures all along.

chapters.title: This Pile of Saint-Grade Cultivation Methods Should Last Me Through the Winter
chapters.original_title: 这堆圣级功法，勉强够我烧整个冬天

chapters.title: He... Wasn't He Supposed to Be Trash? How Did He...
chapters.original_title: 他，他不是个废材吗，他怎么……

chapters.title: You Trash Think You're Qualified to Join My Mufu Peak?
chapters.original_title: 凭你们这群废物，想入我幕府峰，还不够资格

chapters.title: Imperial-Grade Cultivation Methods... By the Sackful?
We Were Too Disrespectful Before—Quick, Kneel!
chapters.original_title: 之前是我们太不恭敬，快快跪下

chapters.title: Don't Think About Anything—Just Open the Method and Cultivate!
chapters.original_title: 啥都不想，打开功法就是干！

chapters.title: You Think an Eighth-Grade Toy Can Compete With Us?
chapters.original_title: 一把八品的破兵器，也敢来碰瓷？

chapters.title: A Pond You Can Never Escape

method_grades: First to Ninth Grade (一品至九品)
